alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 3:23PM EDT until March 25 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR ERIE AND EASTERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 323 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of North East to Wattsburg to near Guys Mills, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Erie, Meadville, Corry, Edinboro, Titusville, North East, Union City, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Wattsburg, Canadohta Lake, Riceville, Northwest Harborcreek, Lincolnville, Guys Mills, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, Cochranton and Saegertown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
